sentences.en: .In retrospect, this battle was a turning point in the war.
sentences.cn: 事后看来，这场战役是战争的转折点。

sentences.en: After the taping became known, I understood various things in retrospect, both innocent and contrived.
sentences.cn: 录音被揭露后,回过头来看, 我明白了很多事, 既有无辜的,也有经过谋划的.

sentences.en: I do think what I've discovered is that a journey can add depth and dimension to a life and even, in retrospect, represent it.
sentences.cn: 我认为我发现的道理是，一次旅行可以增加你生命的深度和广度，甚至在你回顾一生的时候可以侃侃而谈。

sentences.en: In reading his memoirs, In retrospect, I discovered one of the reasons why.
sentences.cn: 回想一下，从阅读他的回忆录中，我发现了其中的原因之一。

sentences.en: In retrospect it may seem odd.
sentences.cn: 回顾一下,似乎有点奇怪.

sentences.en: In retrospect it was a nightmare.
sentences.cn: 回想起来,真是一场恶梦.

sentences.en: In retrospect it's obvious how we went wrong.
sentences.cn: 回想起来,我们是如何出的错就很明显了.

sentences.en: In retrospect we may recognize the danger that lay in a too inflexible perfection of poise.
sentences.cn: 我们回顾一下,就可以发现过于坚定的自信性格中所隐藏的危险.

sentences.en: In retrospect, I wonder if we should have done more.
sentences.cn: 回过头看，我在想我们是否应该做得更多些。

sentences.en: In retrospect, it's easy to see why we were wrong.
sentences.cn: 回顾过去就很容易明白我们的错处了.

sentences.en: It is pleasant in the retrospect.
It was , in retrospect, the happiest day of her life.
sentences.cn: 回想起来, 那是她一生最幸福的日子.

sentences.en: It was a very strange feeling in retrospect — I was frightened, but excited at the same time.
sentences.cn: 回想起来那是一种非常奇怪的感觉——我当时既害怕又兴奋。

sentences.en: It was odd that in retrospect they both seemed equally dreary.
sentences.cn: 回味起来,奇怪的是,它们显得同等地枯燥乏味.

sentences.en: It was, in retrospect, the happiest day of his life.
sentences.cn: 回想起来, 那是他一重中最幸福的日子.

sentences.en: One's school life seems happier in retrospect than in reality.
sentences.cn: 学校生活回忆起来显得比实际上要快乐.

sentences.en: The debate seems, in retrospect, to have been fixed from the beginning.
sentences.cn: 回想起来，这场辩论好像从一开始就被人操纵了。

sentences.en: The respectful spectator gave the prospective president a retrospect of the spectacular spectrum.
sentences.cn: 恭敬的旁观者对未来的总统回顾了壮观的光谱（景象）。

words.tran_cn: 回顾的；怀旧的；可追溯的
